name: TI_LOGAPPENDER
info: Persists data from Sensor / Actors in DB

name: Prep MQTT message to TI.LOG -> logUnitValue
TI.LOGAPPENDER - Interface Definition
info:
Subflow Logs Data to Unit Data tables. 
Mandatory attributes:
    Input                   Variable                    Output                      Description
    msg.payload.sender      -> msg.tmp.sender           msg.payload.sender          -> data table evaluated by Sender
    msg.payload.msgID       -> msg.tmp.id               msg.payload.msgID           -> MsgID to be stored in table
    msg.payload.paramX.value-> msg.tmp.value            msg.payload.paramX.value    -> float value to be stored
    msg.payload.timestamp   -> msg.tmp.timestamp        msg.timestamp               -> Timestamp of the value
                                                        msg.destination             -> "TI.LOG"
                                                        msg.param0                  -> "logUnitValue"
                                                        msg.payload.paramX.event    -> "data"

name: Start Watch
Say Hi
Hi Init
Input Params
func:
var host = global.get('hname');

msg.payload = '{"@class":"org.timeit.apps.core.Msg",' +
            '"destination":"' + host + '.controller", ' +
            '"param0":"AU.SHADE", ' +
            '"paramX":{"direction":"CLOSE",' +
                        '"destination":"B6.CLIMATE.UNIT.SHADE.RIGHT",' +
                        '"destinationcmd":"startLeft",' +
                        '"speed":"1500",' +
                        '"timeout":"25",' +
                        '"switchtop" : "ti88.Switch.J",' +
                        '"switchbottom" : "ti88.Switch.K", ' +
                        '"checkinit" : "true"}}';
                        
return msg;

name: Error
func:
msg.payload.content = msg.errorStatus;

return msg;

name: Input Params
func:
var host = global.get('hname');

msg.payload = '{"@class":"org.timeit.apps.core.Msg",' +
            '"destination":"' + host + '.controller", ' +
            '"param0":"AU.SHADE", ' +
            '"paramX":{"direction":"OPEN",' +
                        '"destination":"B6.CLIMATE.UNIT.SHADE.RIGHT",' +
                        '"destinationcmd":"startRight",' +
                        '"speed":"1500",' +
                        '"timeout":"25",' +
                        '"switchtop" : "ti88.Switch.J",' +
                        '"switchbottom" : "ti88.Switch.K",' +
                        '"checkinit" : "true"}}';
                        
return msg;

name: Check Switch
Start Watch
Start Motor
Stop Motor
Error - no Switch Executed
Reset Timer
Input Params
Check Switch States (Open, Close)
Input Params
func:
msg.payload = {"@class":"org.timeit.apps.core.Msg",
            "destination":"b6climate.controller", 
            "param0":"AU.SHADE", 
            "paramX":{"direction":"CLOSE",
                        "destination":"B6.CLIMATE.UNIT.SHADE.RIGHT",
                        "destinationcmd":"startLeft",
                        "speed":"1500",
                        "timeout":"25",
                        "switchtop" : "b6.Switch.Shade.OR",
                        "switchbottom" : "b6.Switch.Shade.UR"}};
                        
return msg;

name: prep
func:
msg.payload = '{"@class":"org.timeit.apps.core.Msg",' +
                '"destination":"b6climate.controller",' +
                '"param0":"CU.PING",' +
                '"paramX":{"unit":"b6climate.tiRouting"}}'
return msg;
